CoordinateRequest &  req,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const MC2Coordinate &  position,
const TopRegionMatch *&  topMatch
) 
 

Fetch information about the top region at the specific position.

Parameters:
req Coordinate request.
topReq Top region request.
position A coordinate in the region to fetch info for.
topMatch Will contain information about the top region at the coordinate.
Returns:
true if info about the position fetch was succesfully.

Gets municipal name and top region from a position used to determine "where" field for external searches that does not handle coordinate location searches.

Parameters:
position the position we are interested in
language of the municipal
topReq The current top region request.
topRegionID will get correct top region if search was successfull
Returns:
municipal name

Gets the top region id from a posistion.

Parameters:
topReq Top region request.
position A coordinate in the region to fetch top region for.
